page.title: 13Interview with retired lady
page.content:
We decided to interview Mrs.Craig, a retired lady, who has lived in our area for a number of years. She lives with her husband in Napier Avenue and has two sons, who are now at University. Mrs. Craig used to work at our school and was a Primary 5 teacher. We put some questions to her about her life and how retiring affected her.
Q:On average, what time do you get up in the morning? A:Seven o'clock. Q:What do you do to keep busy in the morning? A:Housework and I take college classes in computing. Q:Do you find you have masses of spare time? A:No, I always have something to do.
